entities.name: hermi-one
entities.description: Hermione is introduced as a person who is not enthusiastic about skiing. She has snow in her hair and her face is pink with cold.

entities.name: ron
entities.description: Ron is mentioned as someone who laughed at Hermione's initial statement about skiing being good.

entities.name: mum
entities.description: Hermione mentions her mum as someone who wants her to do well in exams.

entities.name: dad
entities.description: Hermione's dad is mentioned as someone who wants her to do well in exams.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is introduced as the person Hermione is talking to.

entities.name: ginny
entities.description: Ginny is mentioned as someone who is waiting for Harry and Hermione in Ron's bedroom.

entities.name: dumbledore
entities.description: Dumbledore is mentioned as the person who told Hermione about what had happened.

relationships.description: Ron laughed at Hermione's initial statement about skiing being good.
Harry followed Hermione back to the second floor.
